description: 4.2.1 LIVE Has been updated with the latest 9982497 Client/DGS hotfix to address these two issues. STARC-174022 PU - Freight Elevator / Cargo - Cargo area is present on top of Freight Elevator building and placing loose items there will cause "Internal Error" STARC-174557 PU - Resource Gathering - Missions - Resource Gathering Intro / Hauling - Contract unable to complete when there is noticeable "amount/total" in the contract.
